name: Forward (itch) (ma_jetteleger)
description:
[PROTOTYPE] 

Try to reach the end of the line and accumulate every possible success. It's okay to get it wrong sometimes, just try again and correct your mistakes on the way back over.

How to play :

- Tap (or click) and hold to move forward
   (you can also press space of the right arrow key)
- Release to stop
- Alt-F4 to quit the game (if you downloaded the game on Windows)

Each obstacle has its own rules for success :

- Some require to stop at their position
- Some require you not to stop at their position
- Some require you not to stop for a specified length
- Some require waiting a certain amount of time while stopped
- Some require a certain amount of taps while stopped
- Some require waiting and taps
